Theresa Raizenberg bụ onye ama ama n'obodo ndi LGBTQ dika onye na-achọ ikike ndị LGBTQ. Ya na Midi Achmat na Sally Gross bu ndi e nyere 003 Galactic / Allison Masters Community Award. Ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị guzobere TAC. O dere akwụkwọ n'akwụkwọ akụkọ dị iche iche ma na-arụsi ọrụ ike na nzukọ Gay and Lesbian Memory in Action (GALA).
